traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

traits.name: Minion: Savage Horde
traits.desc: After moving at least 20 feet in a straight line toward a creature, the next attack the orc makes against that creature scores a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The White Tusk Bloodrager makes three falchion attacks.

actions.name: Falchion
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.
